resources.string: Time\'s playing tricks on you! Start and end times can\'t be twins, and the end time shouldn\'t try to time-travel before the start. Please pick sensible times!
Time flies, but not that fast! Please make sure your event lasts at least 15 minutesâ€”coffee breaks are longer than this!
Oops! It looks like there\'s already something happening at this time. Time travel may be involved, but you\'ll have to pick another time!
